thread.section_title: Hotel Baume - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Amazing Stay
thread.title_full: Amazing Stay - Review of Hotel Baume, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Hanna K
title: Amazing Stay
text:
We stayed at the Hotel Baume last week for our wedding, as did several of our guests. The hotel staff went above and beyond to make our stay memorable. From helping recover our wedding dress and suit from customs, to champagne on the day of our wedding, to the warm smiles and greetings. It was a magical stay at an unique, beautiful hotel.
Overwhelming recommendations to stay at the Hotel Baume. Close to metro, restaurants (check our Au Petit Suisse!), the Luxembourg, Notre Dame... no need to look elsewhere, this is it!
